section.title: Feature or plug-in based products
section.para: A product can either be based on plug-ins or on features. This setting is done on the Overview tab of the product configuration file.

textobject.phrase: Configuration of the product can be based on features or plug-ins

section.para: On the Contents tab in the product editor you enter the plug-ins or features your products consists of.
A product does not perform automatic dependency resolution. If you add a feature to your product and want to add its dependencies, press the Add Required button.
